messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] massachusettes meeting
messages.msgSnippet: Dina, I m interessted. Jen (Clinton, MA) -- Out there things can happen and frequently do to people as brainy and footsy as you.
messages.messageBody:
Dina,

I'm interessted.

Jen

(Clinton, MA)

--
"Out there things can happen and
frequently do
to people as brainy and footsy as
you."


> hi all
>
> when i started unschooling i had a support group that
> met once a month in the evening for parents and
> nursing babies only. it was great to see people face
> to face and also to put a face with an email. If
> people are interested in a get together on a monthly
> basis I would be willing to volunteer my home. i am
> in northboro ma right off 290. I am close to 495 and
> about 15 min from mass pike. for those of you who
> know the area i live about 5minutes from the solomon
> pond mall.
>
> we used to have topics like "a day in the life of my
> family", nintendo, dealing with siblings, time for
> yourself etc. but it was mostly a come with questions
> and lets all throw it around.
>
> let me know if anyone is interested.
>
> love and peace
> dina
>

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] massachusettes meeting
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/12/2004 11:40:35 AM Eastern Daylight Time, dinafraize@yahoo.com writes: people  are interested in a get together on a monthly basis I
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/12/2004 11:40:35 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
dinafraize@... writes:

people are interested in a get together on a monthly
basis I would be willing to volunteer my home. i am
in northboro ma right off 290. I am close to 495 and
about 15 min from mass pike.


it sounds like a good idea to me, when i was breastfeeding ( many moons
ago) we had groups like that in CT too. I am roughly 45 min from where you
are and fairly familiar with 290/495 i do a lot of traveling transporting the
dogs to NH

Lin

messages.subject: massachusettes meeting
messages.msgSnippet: hi all when i started unschooling i had a support group that met once a month in the evening for parents and nursing babies only.  it was great to see people
messages.messageBody:
hi all

when i started unschooling i had a support group that
met once a month in the evening for parents and
nursing babies only. it was great to see people face
to face and also to put a face with an email. If
people are interested in a get together on a monthly
basis I would be willing to volunteer my home. i am
in northboro ma right off 290. I am close to 495 and
about 15 min from mass pike. for those of you who
know the area i live about 5minutes from the solomon
pond mall.

we used to have topics like "a day in the life of my
family", nintendo, dealing with siblings, time for
yourself etc. but it was mostly a come with questions
and lets all throw it around.

let me know if anyone is interested.

love and peace
dina
